Current restrictions

Borders with Pakistan and Iran closed
Ban on all sports events
Schools are closed
All non essentail shops are closed
Restaurants, bars are closed.

Borders with Pakistan and Iran closed

Last update: 2020-03-16 01:13:50

Seen something not updated or not correct! Let me know at github

How to minimize the risk of infection?

Wash your hands thorough with soap.
Keep at least 1m distance between you and the others.
Wipe down doorhandles and other objets with alcohol wipes.
Cover your mouth and hands with a paper towel.
Avoid groups

What are the symptoms?

Fever
Dry cough
Shortness of breath
Sore throat
Headaches
